title: Wells Fargo Utilities and High Income Fund (ERH) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Wells Fargo Utilities and High Income Fund ( ERH  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.075 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased ERH prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 114th quarter that ERH has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $13.3, the dividend yield is 6.77%.
The previous trading day's last sale of ERH was $13.3, representing a -0.82% decrease from the 52 week high of $13.41 and a 24.42% increase over the 52 week low of $10.69.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the ERH Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
